subject: Re: [junit] The right amount of testing !?
msgSnippet: ... In an article I promised to write and never did, I arrived at the conclusion that parsing the request and representing the request is best done in
messageBody:
>So said Erik Mattsson on 4/25/2003 --------------------
>Hmm, now I see a "problem" with my design, i dont have a middleware between
>the actual HTTP request and the action. The request parsing and the action
>is
>the same class, maybe I should refactor this when Ive the time and the
>need for it.

In an article I promised to write and never did, I arrived at the conclusion that parsing the request and representing the request is best done in different objects. I strongly recommend the refactoring.


J. B. Rainsberger,
President, Diaspar Software Services
Let's write software that people understand.
